<column gap="tiny">

You are an expert at moving through extremely tight spaces. You gain the [Quick Squeeze](/Feats.aspx?ID=828) skill feat, even if you're not trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1). When you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to [Squeeze](/Actions.aspx?ID=31), you get a critical success instead.
